document.docAuthor: Kaczmarek, Łukasz, Bartels, Paul J., Roszkowska, Milena & Nelson, Diane R.

subSubSection.paragraph:

n. sp. (
Renaud-Mornant 1976 b
)

Florarctus hulingsi Renaud Mornant 1976
(D’Addabbo
Gallo et al. 1978
, Grimaldi de Zio et al. 1980 b)

(Grimaldi de Zio et al. 1983 a)

(Grimaldi de Zio et al. 1983 b)

(D’Addabbo
Gallo et al. 1987
, Grimaldi de Zio & D’Addabbo
Gallo 1987
)
Florarctus hulingsi
(Grimaldi de Zio et al. 1980 a,
Sandulli et al. 1999
)

paragraph.emphasis:
Terra typica
: Mediterranean Sea ( Tunisia , Africa)
